refnamediv.refpurpose: tag editor for MP3, Ogg Vorbis files and more

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: easytag is a utility for viewing and editing tags for MP3, MP2, MP4/AAC, FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Opus, Ogg Vorbis, MusePack, Monkey's Audio and WavPack files. Its simple and nice GTK+ interface makes tagging easier under Linux or Windows.

refsect1.title: Invocation
refsect1.para: easytag can take an option or a path as arguments.

refsect2.title: Paths
refsect2.para: Either an absolute or a relative path can be supplied, which will open the path in the browser on startup.

refsect1.title: Author
